basic_node.title: Horizontal/vertical resolution
basic_node.description: Density of emitted laser beams for a given distance.
basic_node.references: [sp6, http://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/5940433/] [sp6, https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/8500511/, More/less beams hitting an object in case of motion scan effect compared to static measurements. Number of additional or less beams hitting the object is then dependent on sensor resolution.]
